Pre-Game Insights: Mohammed Kudus has been named the captain for the Black Stars by coach Otto Addo to lead the team against Sudan.
The Black Stars' doubleheader against Sudan will have a major impact on Ghanaâ€™s chances of qualifying for the 2025 AFCON after failing to win their first two games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana occupy the third position with one point in Group F of the 2025 AFCON qualifiers after two matches.
Angola lead the group with six points, followed by Sudan in second position with three points after two games.
Others: Head coach Otto Addo has assured the public that the team is well prepared for the game despite the withdrawals of some key players, including Thomas Partey.
